A single Covid vaccine dose gives high levels of protection against severe disease, even in the oldest age groups, more evidence shows.… [+4420 chars]
articles.description: A single dose of the Pfizer or Oxford vaccine cuts hospital admissions of older people by about 80%.
articles.title: Covid: Oxford vaccine does protect older people, Europe told - BBC News

articles.title: Humans are already dumping garbage on Mars - BGR
